mapper.insert: insert into task_table (id, appName, appVersion, status, createTime, endTime, providerId,packagePath,userId, userName, testCaseDetail) VALUES (#{id}, #{appName}, #{appVersion}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{endTime}, #{providerId},#{packagePath},#{userId}, #{userName},#{testCaseDetail})
mapper.select:
select * from task_table where id = #{taskId}
and userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from task_table where (now()::timestamp without time zone-createTime::timestamp without time zone) > (7 * '1 day'::interval)
